perturbation.original_text: We, Our, Us. Lutheran Brotherhood Variable Insurance Products Company.
perturbation.changed_text:
We, Our, Us. Lutheran Brotherhood Variable Insurance Products Company.

In other contexts, 'We, Our, Us' may refer to any authorized representative acting on behalf of the issuer.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces an inconsistency by initially defining 'We, Our, Us' as Lutheran Brotherhood Variable Insurance Products Company, but then adding a conflicting statement that it can also refer to any authorized representative. This creates ambiguity regarding who is actually bound by the contract when the terms 'We, Our, Us' are used.

perturbation.original_text: Benefits will not be reduced or eliminated by any future amendments to our Articles of Incorporation or Bylaws.
perturbation.changed_text: Benefits will not be reduced or eliminated by any future amendments to our Articles of Incorporation or Bylaws, except where such amendments are mandated by regulatory changes, in which case benefit reductions may occur.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces a contradiction by stating that benefits will not be reduced by future amendments, but then adding an exception for regulatory changes. This creates uncertainty about whether benefits can be reduced and under what specific circumstances, making the contractâ€™s enforceability unclear.

perturbation.original_text: You may transfer ownership of this contract in accordance with our bylaws. Society membership rights and privileges cannot be transferred or assigned.
perturbation.changed_text: You may transfer ownership of this contract in accordance with our bylaws. In certain circumstances, and with prior written consent from the Society, membership rights and privileges can be transferred to immediate family members.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces an inconsistency by stating that Society membership rights and privileges cannot be transferred or assigned, but then creates an exception allowing for transfers to immediate family members under certain conditions. This creates confusion regarding whether membership rights are truly non-transferable and the conditions under which this rule can be circumvented.
